name: MusexPress Blog
description: The first WordPress Blog fully customizable with Adobe Muse

name: MusexPress Boxes
description: Managing the contents of your Muse pages with a CMS has never been so easy

name: MusexPress Dynamic Menu
description: The Dynamic Menu is a powerful plugin that gives users the first and real dynamic menu for Muse.

name: MusexPress Login Area
description: Create a Restricted Area with Muse and manage your subscribers with WordPress

name: MusexPress Blog Lite
description: This plugin enable MusexPress Blog Lite functionality and allows you to manage your Muse Website contents. Lite version.

name: MusexPress Frontend Editor
description: This plugin enable MusexPress Frontend Editor functionality and allows you to manage your Muse website contents.

name: MusexPress Page Creator
description: This plugin enable MusexPress Page Creator, and allows you to create and manage new pages directly from Wordpress Admin Panel

name: Ultimate Member for Muse
description: MusexPress Ultimate Member allows you to add a complete login and restricted area to your Muse site.

name: MusexPress
description: This plugin enable MusexPress functionality and allows you to manage your Muse website contents.

name: MusexPress Booking
description: A powerful and fully dynamic tool for multi-purpose bookings with the MusexPress CMS

name: MusexPress Sidebar
description: The MusexPress Sidebar lets you easily add sidebars to your Woocommerce store to give users a great navigation experience

name: MusexPress Search Box
description: The first dynamic search box for Muse that help your users to get to their final destination quickly and easily

name: MusexPress Social Share
description: Make it so easy to share your contents that readers don’t even need to think about it!

name: MusexPress Woocommerce
description: The first WordPress Woocommerce fully customizable with Adobe Muse
